import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import "../App.css"; import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; export default function Breads() { const [ { products}, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const loadProducts = async () => { dispatch({ type: "fetch_products" }) } useEffect(() => { console.log(products, 2 % 2) loadProducts().then( () => console.log(products)) }, [products]) return (
{ products?.length ? products.map( (product, i) => {

{product.product_name}

{product.product_descr}

}) :

Loading Products...
